creator: seapwc@halcyon.com
text:
Where it says "UPDATE THIS"
replace that line with these two.
<property enviornment="env />
<property name="catalina.home" value="${env.CATALINA_HOME}"

If the user has CATALINA_HOME set, 
then the build will run without any changes.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: This change doesn't particularly simplify things since most users don't need to set CATALINA_HOME. Therefore, leave webapps/docs/appdev/build.xml.txt as is.
